title: Friday Post Show (09-24-21)
itunes:title: Friday Post Show (09-24-21)
description:
Bobby talks to Raymundo who has now also written and recorded a jingle for the Morgan & Morgan Jingle contest. The one Eddie submitted to a couple weeks ago. We listen to both. Raymundo shares a story that he was invited to a reality TV event in LA. We get an update on Bobby’s Cat Tail. Bobby rolls through some news stories: Tiger King 2 has been announced, an 11-year old who pistol whipped a man during a carjacking with his mom and a person who pulled a gun on Chipotle because they were closing. We debate on whether or not to let Raymundo go to an event in Los Angeles.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
